definitions.title: n. pr. 1. m. a.
definitions.body: (eldest) ‘ son ’ of Aram Ge 10:23 (P), = ‘ son ’ of Shem 1Ch 1:17, LXX Wv, LXXL Ch Ouz.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: eldest ‘ son ’ of Naḥor Ge 22:21 (J), A Wc, LXXL Wz.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: Edomite name Ge 36:28 = 1Ch 1:42, LXX Wv, LXXL Ouv

definitions.title: c
definitions.body: ), [[מַלְכֵי אֶרֶץ הָעוּץ]] Je 25:20 (LXX om.); [[בְּאֶרֶץ־עוּץ]] Job 1:1 (home of Job), LXX Ausitiv; La 4:21 (del. [[עוּץ]] LXX cf. Bu and reff.); on Uz as vague name for E. country v. esp. Bu:ix. f.; Dl:Pa 259, ZKF ii. 87 ff. puts in Hauran, or N. (NE.) therefrom, = As. Uṣṣu, but dub. With name [[עוּץ]] RS:K 261 cp. Ar. n. pr. div. 9awd., so We:Heid. 2, 146; against this Nö:ZMG xi (1886), 183 f., but v. reply RS:Sem i. 43.
